system.descriptor: Communicate with others using the same language. Test not needed unless communication involves obscure dialects, complex concepts, or bad conditions.
system.uses:
From Prior editions includes: Ciphers, Literacy, Secret Tongue, and Speak Language)
Use: Deciphering an Archaic version of a known language, writing a moving piece of prose, conveying a message in subtext or with limited vocabulary. All Guardsman know Low Gothic and Imperial Codes.
Example Languages: Chapter Runes, Chaos Marks, Eldar, High Gothic, Imperial Codes, Kroot, Low Gothic, Mercenary Cant, Ork, Techna-Lingua, Tau, Underworld, Xenos Markings
system.useTime: Free Action unless doing something complex
